thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 08 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Pixium Vision FY Operating Loss Widens to 12.7‍​ Million Euros

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Pixium Vision FY Operating Loss Widens to 12.7‍​ Million Euros
text:
Feb 8 (Reuters) - PIXIUM VISION SA:
* FY REVENUE EUR ‍​2.5 MILLION VERSUS EUR 2.5 MILLION YEAR AGO
* FY OPERATING LOSS EUR 12.7‍​ MILLION VERSUS LOSS OF EUR 12.5 MILLION YEAR AGO
* FY NET LOSS EUR 13.5‍​ MILLION VERSUS LOSS OF EUR 12.4 MILLION YEAR AGO
* FEASIBILITY CLINICAL STUDY WITH PRIMA SHOULD START WITH FIRST IMPLANTATIONS IN THE FIRST HALF OF 2018‍​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
